ingredients.content: 320 g ripe mango flesh, cut in pieces

preparations.content: Place all ingredients in mixing bowl and chop <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then heat <b>6 min 30 sec/80°C/speed 3.5<b>.
Blend <b>30 sec/speed 10<b>. Allow to cool, then store in fridge until ready to serve.
